name: Heal or die
description:
Game description:

You are seriously ill, but this is a strange disease, to continue living you need to stop taking medications without stopping, and to run.

Use the mouse to navigate the menu.

To jump, use the "Spacebar" button.
To activate the bonus, click on the bonus image when it appears in the lower left corner.

Author comments:

This game was made for jam: "48 Secret Jam" in 48 hours.
